name: Royal AÃ©ro Para Club Spa
about: The Royal Aero Para Club de Spa, located in the scenic Belgian Ardennes, is a premier aviation training facility committed to excellence in pilot education. Governed by stringent EASA regulations, the club ensures aspiring pilots receive top-notch training that meets global aviation standards. With a team of experienced and professional instructors, the club offers a range of programs including Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Night Rating, and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL). The club is renowned for its friendly staff, well-organized facilities, and a strong focus on safety and community engagement. Whether you aim for a private pilot license or seek to advance your aviation career, the Royal Aero Para Club de Spa provides the ideal environment to help you achieve your flying aspirations.
